tool_description: Up to date bank interest rates
name: Mystral
title: Mystral

api_list.name: rates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mystral.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mystral.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mystral.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mystral.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
